Package com.samysadi.acs.virtualization.job.operation

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LongOperation<Resource extends LongResource>
    This interface defines an Operation that uses a LongResource.
    Operation<Resource>
    An operation is RunnableEntity that needs a certain amount of running time in order to be completed.
    The needed running time directly depends on the allocated resource for the operation.
    OperationDelayer<O extends LongOperation<?>>
    This interface defines an operation delayer which is used to determine when an operation should be delayed.
    OperationSynchronizer
    This interface defines an operation synchronizer, which can be used to synchronize multiple SynchronizableOperations.
    RemoteOperation<Resource>
    This interface describes an Operation that has also a destination Job.
    SynchronizableOperation<Resource>
    An operation that can be synchronized with other operations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LongOperationImpl<Resource extends LongResource>
    This is the default implementation of the LongOperation interface.
    LongResource
    Defines a resource that contains a long as its main value.
    OperationImpl<Resource>  
    OperationSynchronizerDefault
    Default implementation of the OperationSynchronizer interface.
    SynchronizableLongOperationImpl<Resource extends LongResource>
    A LongOperationImpl that implements the SynchronizableOperation interface.
    TimeResource
    Used by TimerOperation.
    TimerOperation
    A operation that runs for a given delay, then becomes completed.
